languages.text: {n}Идира кивает и с видимым усилием заставляет себя улыбнуться.{/n} "Так точно, {name}. Клянусь, я буду полезна как никогда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира кивает и с видимым усилием заставляет себя улыбнуться.{/n} "Так точно, {name}. Клянусь, я буду полезна как никогда".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира кивает и с видимым усилием заставляет себя улыбнуться.{/n} "Так точно, {name}. Клянусь, я буду полезна как никогда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Indira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉点点头，带着明显的努力，强迫自己露出笑容。{/n}“我明白了，{name}。我发誓，我会比以前更有用的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉点点头，带着明显的努力，强迫自己露出笑容。{/n}“我明白了，{name}。我发誓，我会比以前更有用的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira asiente y, con evidente esfuerzo, esboza una sonrisa.{/n} «Entendido, {name}. Juro que seré más útil que nunca».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira asiente y, con evidente esfuerzo, esboza una sonrisa.{/n} «Entendido, {name}. Juro que seré más útil que nunca».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはうなずき、明らかに無理をして笑った。{/n}「わかった、{name}様。今まで以上に役に立てることを誓うわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはうなずき、明らかに無理をして笑った。{/n}「わかった、{name}様。今まで以上に役に立てることを誓うわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira nickt und ringt sich sichtlich bemüht ein Lächeln ab.{/n} "Ich verstehe, {name}. Ich schwöre, ich werde nützlicher denn je sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira nickt und ringt sich sichtlich bemüht ein Lächeln ab.{/n} "Ich verstehe, {name}. Ich schwöre, ich werde nützlicher denn je sein."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira acquiesce et esquisse à grand-peine un sourire forcé.{/n} « Compris, {name}. Vous ne le regretterez pas, je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira acquiesce et esquisse à grand-peine un sourire forcé.{/n} « Compris, {name}. Vous ne le regretterez pas, je vous le promets. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Baş sallayan İdira'nın kendini gülümsemek için zorladığı her hâlinden belli oluyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı {name}. Her işe koşacağıma söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods and with visible effort forces herself to smile.{/n} "Understood, {name}. I swear I'll be more useful than ever before."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira başını sallıyor ve kendini gülümsemek için zorladığı her hâlinden belli oluyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı {name}. Her işe koşacağıma söz veriyorum."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
